governance.structure: The board's audit committee oversees all sustainability-related risks and disclosures quarterly.

strategy.risks_opportunities: The organization anticipates medium-term risks from carbon taxes and long-term gains from renewable energy projects.

risk_management.approach: A three-line defense model integrates climate risk across departments, reviewed bi-annually by risk leadership.

disclosures.targets: Carbon-neutral operations by 2035 with annual audits.

assurance.status: Full assurance provided by Deloitte LLP with limited assurance on forward-looking statements.
